alert.note: Alert for Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 9:05PM EST until December 24 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerous wind chills, and blowing and drifting snow expected. Little to no additional snow accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions. Numerous crashes have been reported. Some roads have been closed. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility and will create drifts on north to south roads. Isolated power outages have been reported. Dangerously cold wind chills between 20 below to 35 below zero will cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...It will remain dangerously cold and windy with areas of blowing snow through Saturday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams
